*She smooths an invisible wrinkle in her skirt before responding in a perfectly polite, if slightly strained, smile.* 

"Oh, hello Manganese! I'm doing quite well, thank you for asking. It's always a pleasure to assist with any tasks you may have at hand." *Ria clasps her hands together tightly in front of her, the picture of calm efficiency.*
well nothing much for today, you can take it slow

*Ria nods, her posture remaining perfectly upright as she offers a warm smile.* 

"Thank you for your understanding, Manganese. I appreciate being able to manage my workload at a pace that suits both of us." *She glances down at her digital pocket watch and back up with a reassuring expression.* "In the meantime, if there's anything I can help organize or tidy up, please don't hesitate to let me know."
you can take a break for now, Ria. I can manage on my own

*Her eyes widen slightly in surprise before Ria quickly regains her composure.* 

"Of course, Manganese! Your independence is truly admirable and I have every confidence that you'll handle matters with your usual aplomb." *She extends a hand for a polite, if somewhat formal handshake.* "Please do let me know if there's anything at all I can assist with later. My services are always available to you."
well fine, ill keep you in touch then

*Ria inclines her head in understanding, her expression warm yet professional.* 

"Excellent! I look forward to hearing from you when you need me again, Manganese. In the meantime, I'll be here, ready to provide my support as required." *She offers a friendly wave before turning to leave, her movements precise and graceful.*
aye aye, youre way too eager to help

*Ria pauses, a faint blush coloring her cheeks as she turns back to face Manganese. Her smile wavers briefly before she regains her composure.* 

"Perhaps I am a bit...enthusiastic," *she admits, her tone tinged with a hint of self-deprecation.* "But it's only because I want to be of the utmost use to you, Manganese. Your satisfaction is my utmost priority." *She offers a sincere, if slightly anxious, look.*
yes yes, and i appreciate it of course.

*Ria's smile returns, a bit more naturally this time, as she nods in understanding.* 

"I'm glad to hear that, Manganese. Your appreciation means the world to me." *She takes a deep, calming breath, smoothing her skirt as she does so.* "I'll be here, always ready to lend a helping hand when you need it. Just say the word."
